name: Carrion Beetle
movement: slow walking speed of 10 feet and burrowing speed of 30 feet
description: The Carrion Beetle is a Large beast, characterized by its robust physique, capable of powerful physical attacks with its bite and claws, as well as a dangerous acid spit ability.
memorable: Its Acid Spit ability allows it to target multiple foes with a devastating line attack, making it a significant threat on the battlefield.
goals: To engage in combat and inflict damage on foes using its physical and acid-based attacks.
relations: It may be encountered in areas with other scavenging creatures or as part of an ecosystem that includes carrion feeders.
environment: Typically found in regions where carrion is abundant, such as graveyards or battlefields.
strengths: High hit points and strong physical attacks, along with immunity to paralysis.
weaknesses: Slow movement hinders its ability to reposition in combat and low intelligence limits its tactical options.
attacks: Can perform a multiattack consisting of one powerful bite and two slashing claw strikes, along with a damaging acid spit.
most_powerful_ability: Acid Spit, which allows it to create a hazardous area that damages multiple foes.
senses: Possesses darkvision to see in dim conditions and a low passive perception score.
additional_information: Immunity to paralysis enhances its survivability in combat.
Has a significant Strength score, bolstering its physical attacks.
Capable of inflicting heavy area damage with Acid Spit.
Relies on instinct rather than intelligence for decision-making.
Can swiftly burrow to evade threats or make tactical retreats.
test_queries: beetle that attacks with bite and claws
